languages.text: {n}Последнее испытание. От вас хотят жертву. Если {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}трактовать{/d} весь этот мистический поиск как повторение пути древней святой, то жертвой должны стать вы. Слиться с кровью, пропитавшей флагман от носа до кормы.{/n}

{n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself — to merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Последнее испытание. От вас хотят жертву. Если {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}трактовать{/d} весь этот мистический поиск как повторение пути древней святой, то жертвой должны стать вы. Слиться с кровью, пропитавшей флагман от носа до кормы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself. Merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die letzte Prüfung. Dieses Mal wollen sie, dass du ein Opfer erbringst. Würde man diese ganze mystische Suche als Wiederholung der Reise des Heiligen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpretieren{/d}, wäre die logische Schlussfolgerung, dass du dich selbst opfern musst ... um mit dem Blut zu verschmelzen, das auf deinem Flaggschiff vom Bug bis zum Heck vergossen wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself — to merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die letzte Prüfung. Dieses Mal wollen sie, dass du ein Opfer erbringst. Würde man diese ganze mystische Suche als Wiederholung der Reise des Heiligen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpretieren{/d}, wäre die logische Schlussfolgerung, dass du dich selbst opfern musst ... um mit dem Blut zu verschmelzen, das auf deinem Flaggschiff vom Bug bis zum Heck vergossen wurde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La dernière épreuve. Ils attendent cette fois un sacrifice. S'il fallait {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpréter{/d} toutes ces recherches mystiques comme un écho du périple du saint, la conclusion logique serait que vous devez vous sacrifier pour vous unir au sang ayant submergé le navire amiral de la proue à la poupe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself — to merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La dernière épreuve. Ils attendent cette fois un sacrifice. S'il fallait {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpréter{/d} toutes ces recherches mystiques comme un écho du périple du saint, la conclusion logique serait que vous devez vous sacrifier pour vous unir au sang ayant submergé le navire amiral de la proue à la poupe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prueba final. Esta vez quieren que ofrezcas un sacrificio. Si vas a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpretar{/d} esta búsqueda mística como la repetición del viaje de un santo, la conclusión lógica sería que debes sacrificar tu propio ser: unirte a la sangre que empapa la nave insignia desde la proa hasta la popa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself — to merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La prueba final. Esta vez quieren que ofrezcas un sacrificio. Si vas a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpretar{/d} esta búsqueda mística como la repetición del viaje de un santo, la conclusión lógica sería que debes sacrificar tu propio ser: unirte a la sangre que empapa la nave insignia desde la proa hasta la popa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}最後の試練だ。今回は、生贄を捧げることを求めている。この謎めいた求道のすべてを聖者の旅路の再現であると{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}解釈する{/d}ならば、論理的な結論は自分自身を犠牲にすること…つまり旗艦の船首から船尾までを染め上げている血とひとつになるということだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself — to merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最後の試練だ。今回は、生贄を捧げることを求めている。この謎めいた求道のすべてを聖者の旅路の再現であると{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}解釈する{/d}ならば、論理的な結論は自分自身を犠牲にすること…つまり旗艦の船首から船尾までを染め上げている血とひとつになるということだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这是最后的试炼。这一次，他们想要让你献上祭品。如果把这场神秘的探索{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}解释{/d}为重新踏上创始人曾走过的旅途，那合乎逻辑的结论是——你应该把你自己当做祭品献上。只有这样，才能与这艘旗舰的血脉融为一体。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself — to merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这是最后的试炼。这一次，他们想要让你献上祭品。如果把这场神秘的探索{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}解释{/d}为重新踏上创始人曾走过的旅途，那合乎逻辑的结论是——你应该把你自己当做祭品献上。只有这样，才能与这艘旗舰的血脉融为一体。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son sınav. Bu sefer senden bir kurban vermeni istiyorlar. Eğer ki kişi, tüm bu gizemli arayışı azizin yolculuğunun bir tekerrürü olarak {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}yorumlarsa{/d} o hâlde en mantıklı sonuç, kurban olarak senin öne çıkman olur. Sancak gemisini tepeden tırnağa sırılsıklam eden kanla birleşmek için kurban sen olmalısın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final test. This time, they want you to make a sacrifice. If one were to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}interpret{/d} this entire mystical search as a repetition of the saint's journey, then the logical conclusion is that you are supposed to sacrifice yourself — to merge with the blood that has drenched the flagship from bow to stern.{/n}
